bibl.bibl: Agassiz, Louis. 1868. Distribution géographique des animaux dans ses rapports avec leur origine. Revue des Cours Scientifiques 5: 643–8.
bibl.idno: The journal (’68 not at UL) has him as ‘M. L.’ Agassiz at U. of Cambridge, U.S., but they also got JDH’s initial wrong, then at the end of the article, it is ‘A. Agassiz’ who was then at a Michigan mine.
